item.title: Base 2 2 the 6
item.description: We are given this string: Q1RGbGVhcm57RmxhZ2d5V2FnZ3lSYWdneX0K Since it has numbers, lowercase letters and uppercase letters, it seems to be encoded in Base64. Actually, the name of the challenge is “2 2 the 6” (“2 to the 6”), so $2^6 = 64$. We can decode it using a shell: $ echo Q1RGbGVhcm57RmxhZ2d5V2FnZ3lSYWdneX0K | base64 -d CTFlearn{FlaggyWaggyRaggy}
